body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting ABC Car Dealership Customer Service. My name is Larry Morgan. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Larry, my name is Elizabeth Allen.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Elizabeth. Can you please provide me with your date of birth in the format day, month, and year separately?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one four, zero five, one nine eight seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Elizabeth. And could you also provide me with the last four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's eight nine six two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Elizabeth. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you, Larry.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Elizabeth. Thank you for contacting us. Have a great day!
